content:
Craft an item of type: dark_oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 8, "index": 16}, {"type": "crying_obsidian", "quantity": 36, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 46, "index": 34}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 17, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft dark_oak_fence_gate, I need to place 2 dark_oak_planks between 2 sticks in the crafting grid. The first step is to move one stick from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 8, "index": 16}, {"type": "crying_obsidian", "quantity": 36, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 46, "index": 34}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 17, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that one stick is placed in slot 1, I need to move one dark_oak_plank to slot 2 which is between slot 1 and slot 3 where I will place the other stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_fence_gate

thought: Finally, I need to place a stick in slot 3 to complete the pattern and craft the dark_oak_fence_gate.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 3 with quantity 1
